DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim study gather information hypoglycaemia ( low blood glucose ) among patient Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus . The study retrospective prospective .
DOC.brief_title: An International Survey Hypoglycaemia Among Insulin-treated Patients With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients Type 1 Type 2 diabetes mellitus treat insulin 12 month Patients give informed consent participate survey Nonambulatory patient Illiterate patient patient otherwise unable complete write survey
